metadata.synopsis: Zhent agents panic as they prepare to be attacked by gnolls

0.speaker: Olly
0.text: I'm out of flasks! They're coming!
0.context: NodeContext: terrified, shouting desperately during a battle - the 'flask' are like flammable grenades he was using to hold back monsters, and now he's run out they're coming for him

1.speaker: Rugan
1.text: That's the last of the flasks! Fall back!
1.context: NodeContext: Shouting desperately during a battle - the flasks are like flammable grenades. Running out means they have to flee because the fire was holding their enemies back.
